simplesect.para: NavigationHelper aids in navigation between pages.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para: It provides commands used to navigate back and forward as well as registers for standard mouse and keyboard shortcuts used to go back and forward in Windows and the hardware back button in Windows Phone. In addition it integrates SuspensionManger to handle process lifetime management and state management when navigating between pages.
To make use of NavigationHelper, follow these two steps or start with a BasicPage or any other Page item template other than BlankPage.

section.title: AppStore.Common.NavigationHelper.NavigationHelper (Page page)
section.emphasis: <summary> Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="NavigationHelper"/> class.

entry.para: A reference to the current page used for navigation. This reference allows for frame manipulation and to ensure that keyboard navigation requests only occur when the page is occupying the entire window.
